verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Stir me to do more than just believe
Stir me I have live so silently

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Stir me with the very thought of thee
Stir me oh Lord

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
God has given to men
His commission and plan a message to be shared

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
how Christ suffered and bled then was raised from the dead
No greater love compare

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
It is easy to send when there's lost men to win
some other one instead so much more could be done a
great multitude won if all would be Christ led

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Daring faith must depend upon spirit to win
The gates of hell are strong tongues of fire He will give,
breath of God be not still until the victor's song
